name: Sofab_Austin_Almond_Three_Seat_Sofa_With_Four_Accent_Pillows
reviews: Was surprised at how well this sofa was packaged. I put it together myself and was easy. The hard part was trying to get the two boxes in the house. Happy with purchase. (Pillows are very nice quality)
Single female and assembled by myself. Sturdy and comfortable.

I wasn't sure about ordering this sofa, but I was pleasantly surprised. My husband is able to lay on it and has room left over (he's 6 feet tall) and it's fairly comfortable. The only reason why I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the cushions slip a bit. Otherwise, I consider this a great purchase!
description: The Sofab Austin almond 3 seat sofa brings ample seating to any room.  The Austin sofa features 2 sets of reversible fashion accent pillows with cool calming colors and clean transitional styling.Furniture Pattern: SolidType: SofaProduct Features: Eco-FriendlyStyle: Transitional, Casual, ContemporaryMaterial: Fabric, Foam, Poly Synthetic Fiber, Polyester Blend, WoodAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: AlmondColor: Tan, BeigeStyleCasual, Contemporary, Nautical, TransitionalMaterialFabric, Foam, Poly Synthetic Fiber, Polyester Blend, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, TanFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesEco-Friendly
